column5: will be at pine point resort 6-12 thru 6-19.anyone back from this lake yet? any reports will be appreciated....jigmeister
I'm going the 11th to the 18th of June as well and am looking for the same heads up!!!

Jigmeister, For reports on LDML, or any fishery that close to Thunder Bay, you'll get more information through Thunder Bay Fishing. Several threads discussing LDML this spring. Here's one:http://fishingboard.thunderbayfishin...showtopic=7856 Cheers, NWO Fishing Bum

i fished lac the first 2 weekends. the first weekend the fish were in 15-17 feet in the pine point area and it was slow in sawmill bay. last weekend was the exact opposite. we fished the deeper water with little to show. we then came back to sand point and they were literally jumping in the boat
anyone else back from lac des milles lacs with a report?
